techmeme.title: Instagram adds a comment feature for Stories; by default, only followers you follow back can leave comments (Lauren Forristal/TechCrunch)
Dutch regulator fines Clearview AI €30.5M, following fines from the UK, France, Australia, and Italy, but Clearview says it is not subject to GDPR (Lauren Feiner/The Verge)
Intel debuts Core Ultra 200V chips, touting AI performance, to ship in laptops from September 24 and rival Qualcomm's Snapdragon X Elite and AMD's Strix Point (Sean Hollister/The Verge)
A deepfake porn crisis has hit 500+ South Korean schools, as police investigate crime rings targeting two major universities and consider a probe into Telegram (Jean Mackenzie/BBC)
Elon Musk says xAI brought its "Colossus 100k H100 training cluster online" over the weekend, which will "double in size to 200k (50k H200s) in a few months" (Christiaan Hetzner/Fortune)
